issues.details: Initial repository verification failed: `/app/ui/` directory was missing.
issues.resolution: Created `/app/ui/` and subdirectories (`components`, `constants`, `hooks`, `store`). Reported anomaly to Operator.

issues.details: Fallback validation script `validate_file_tree_truth_v2.py` failed due to known SyntaxError: unterminated string literal on line 25.
issues.resolution: Corrected the string replacement line 25 from `replace(

issues.details: ESLint validation failed repeatedly with `ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND: Cannot find package '@eslint/js'`. Installation in `/app/frontend` was insufficient.
issues.resolution: Installed `@eslint/js` and related plugins (`eslint-plugin-react-hooks`, `eslint-plugin-react-refresh`) at the repository root using `pnpm add -D`. Resolved subsequent `no-unused-vars` error by commenting out unused import.

issues.details: Initial execution of `update_plan_15_33.py` failed due to `SyntaxError: invalid syntax` (incorrect line break).
issues.resolution: Corrected the syntax error in the script and re-executed successfully.

issues.details: Truth validation (`validate_file_tree_truth_v2.py`) reported 1003 files found on disk (primarily in `node_modules`) that are not tracked in the canonical plan.
issues.resolution: Acknowledged. No action taken as these are expected untracked build/dependency artifacts.

overall_drift_assessment: Moderate drift encountered due to missing repository structure and multiple script/configuration errors (validation, ESLint, plan update). All issues were resolved during batch execution, allowing successful completion. Untracked files warning persists.
